room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Undead" by Epic Escape Game in Cheyenne
review: I tried the Cursed Room with my family for my birthday and it was so much fun. Definitely will be coming back to try another room. Also, service and hints were excellent. Definitely recommend for anyone who likes a challenge and the idea of an apocalypse!

room_title: Escape room "Curse of the Undead" by Epic Escape Game in Cheyenne
review: This place is awesome! My wife and I went here for a date night and did the curse of the Zombie room. We were only able to solve half the puzzle in the allotted time. We had a BLAST. The staff is friendly and really works to accommodate scheduling needs. The whole thing is just a great idea! It's about 25 dollars a person and is worth every red cent. The puzzles are varied and include having to find codes and do some math and really observe the environment you're in. I can't wait to go again.
